Well, I finally got it working. I had the stuck at loading problem, heres what I did

I installed the game to
C:Program Files (x86)Rockstar GamesMax Payne 3

Let the install do its thing after it was done,

I then updated rockstar social club by using the installer contained on the iso.

Played it.

Hope this helps

Update: Working ! Finally Fixed stuck at loading screen.
Installed Social Club 1st C:Program Files(x86) as i'm running Win 7 x64.
Intsalled Max Payne 3 to Rockstar Games folder so it sits next to social club folder NOT black box folder.
Disconnected internet and ran game and it now works.

How I solve everything

1. Run Setup
2. Check all (DirectX, VC++, Social Club), dont check shortcut - you dont need it
3. Start installing
4. It will also start installing MP3_Launcher.exe (install it)
5. Check your antivir if it doesnt point out gsrld.dll in your quarantine, if so... restore it and make it for an exception
6. Throw your net cabel out from your PC (its need to be done !!!!!)
7. Launch PlayMaxPayne3.exe as an administrator from directory of Max Payne 3
8. It will write there... you need internet connection to update
9. Click on Offline mode
10. Max Payne starts, you dont need to create an account
11. Enjoy

Everything works for me. Tested on Vista SP2 32bit. Hope it will help you.
...and also big Thanks to uploader and Black Box team :)
